name: Ninja Shuriken Blocker
description:
Ninja Shuriken Blocker is a great arcade game. In the game, you need to tap the screen to block the shuriken from hitting the ninjas.

Are you bored? Need to kill a little time? This is the perfect cure for boredom. This is a fun game for all kids and adults. Its time for the ultimate shuriken showdown. One of the best app for your kids on summer vacations for indoor activity. Get the latest Shuriken Blocking game that has been the craze in the world.

DOWNLOAD IT NOW FOR FREE! You won't be able to put this hot new game down! It's marvelously addicting.


[How to play]
> Tap on falling shuriken before they hit on head of the ninjas.
